import * as React from 'react' import './index.scss' import logo from '../../assets/spotifyLogo.svg' import illustration from '../../assets/landingIlustration.svg' import { render } from '@testing-library/react' import apiMethods from '../../api/index' import queryString from 'querystring' import { useHistory, useLocation } from 'react-router' interface LandingPageProps { token: String | null fetchToken: (code: string | string[]) => void } export default function LandingPage ({ token, fetchToken }: LandingPageProps) { const location = useLocation() React.useEffect(() => { if (!token) { const query = queryString.parse(location.search) if (query['?code']) { fetchToken(query['?code']) } else if (query['?error']) { console.log('error') history.push('/') } } }) return (
